title: Ways to Not Be Parent of the Year
itunes:title: Ways to Not Be Parent of the Year
description:
Friday- Today on the show we had comedian Gerald Kelly stop by where he spoke about his "Father and Sons" comedy tour and more. Also, after Charlamagne gave well deserved "Donkey of the Day" to Dray Michelle after she commented about not wanting to sign her child's homework, we opened up the phone lines to see what out listeners thought about her comment. Lets just say Draya is definitely not getting "Parent of the Year". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
